artist: Designer: John Grice; Author: Frederick Howard Collins; Printer: John Grice; Publisher: Evergreen Press, Gloucestershire, England
description: long, slender hardcover bound book; diamond-shaped label on upper portion with 'PUNCTUATION' spelled across center of label with floral designs lining top and bottom; interior of book contains black and red text intermixed with same floral designs that are on cover label; bound volume; 49 pp.; lender's archive #37N
markings:
Numbered on colophon page: 67
Watermark: Zerkall Bütten
medium: Letterpress printed in black and red ink; bound volume
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Punctuation: A Printer's Study
